# --- Development ---
dev:
    npm run dev

clean:
    npm run clean

rebuild:
    npm run rebuild

kill:
    npm run kill3000

# --- Prisma ---
migrate:
    npx prisma migrate dev --name update

reset:
    npx prisma migrate reset

generate:
    npx prisma generate

seed:
    npx ts-node prisma/seed.ts

# --- Docker ---
docker-build:
    docker build -t bid-eval-backend .

docker-run:
    docker run -p 3000:3000 bid-eval-backend

# --- Database ---
backup:
    bash tools/db/backup.sh

restore:
    bash tools/db/restore.sh $(file)
